channel.title: Apply on t-student
channel.description: Recent content in Apply on t-student

item.title: Using apply functions in R
item.description: Here is a simple for loop as might be used in a simulation. This is just the first layer and produces one instance of the data. We would run this function a large number of times in our simulation. The function takes some parameters and generates a series of values in each time period. All of data is accumulated in a data.frame which is returned at the end of the function.
